about_the_game:
Take the Advanced Kick Exam and become a true kick master!

Game Contents

Kick the ball and aim for the goal in this simple yet deep kick action game!

Standing before you are a variety of obstacles, such as the wind changing the ball's trajectory and jumping dolls. Overcome the obstacles with skillful control and strategy and aim for the goal.

With a total of 40 stages, it is designed to be enjoyed by beginners and advanced players alike. In addition, this game has evolved from the previous one and is newly equipped with a "Drive Kick Mode". This allows for technical kicks that make full use of falling balls, greatly expanding the scope of the game.

This game is perfect not only for those who like free kicks, but also for those who want to experience the joy of improving through practice. Enjoy the challenging play where you can feel your growth with every challenge!

Gameplay Video and Distribution Guidelines

You can publish and distribute gameplay videos without permission.

Credit notation is not required.

The developer is not responsible for any damage caused by publishing and distributing gameplay videos of this game.

These guidelines are subject to change.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
